---
class: Psion
name: Empathy
title: Empathy
school: Telepathy
rank: 1
type: Assault
brief: Telepathically communicate with other minds.
---

# Empathy

The ability to read and implant emotions in others' minds.

# Rank 0 / 0 Mana
- Detect Emotions

# Rank 1 / 1 Mana
- Attraction/Repulsion
- Emotion: Fear
- Emotion: Rage
- (remove emotional effect)


# Rank 2 / 2 Mana
- Emotion: Calm (target becomes docile)
- Emotion: Love


# Other Modifiers
- For +1 mana, convert from target into burst 1 (stackable)
bodyHtml:
Empathy

The ability to read and implant emotions in others' minds.

Rank 0 / 0 Mana

  • Detect Emotions

Rank 1 / 1 Mana

  • Attraction/Repulsion
  • Emotion: Fear
  • Emotion: Rage
  • (remove emotional effect)

Rank 2 / 2 Mana

  • Emotion: Calm (target becomes docile)
  • Emotion: Love

Other Modifiers

  • For +1 mana, convert from target into burst 1 (stackable)
